#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
int gcd(int a, int b)
{
    if(b==0)
        return a;
    return (b,a%b);
}
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int n,m,a;
    scanf("%d%d%d",&n,&m,&a);
    if(n%a==0)
        n/=a;
    else
        n=n/a+1;
    if(m%a==0)
        m/=a;
    else
        m=m/a+1;
    printf("%d",n*m);
    return 0;
}
